web/src/components/tailadmin-ui/index.js.description: DropdownContext now includes ref system for keyboard navigation: registerMenuItem, unregisterMenuItem, getMenuItems functions, plus focusedIndex state. Menu items register themselves on mount (if not disabled) and unregister on unmount. The menuItemsRef array is reset when dropdown closes.

web/src/components/machines/MachineCard..description: MachineCard uses TailAdmin DropdownMenu for the action menu (lines 621-665). This is the primary use case that needs keyboard accessibility.
